model.dao

Class GroupDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.dao.GroupDAO

  • public class GroupDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    A User Group object that contains the different attributes of a group and its functions on the system. this is a DAO object of a User Group. IMPORTANT NOTE: this program still does not have the final database object for groups.
    Since:
    10/29/2017 original code: 10/27/17 by Leebet Barraquias last update: 11/07/17 by L. Barraquias - added getters & setters

      • AddGroup

        public static boolean AddGroup(java.lang.String groupname,
                               int userID,
                               int[] members,
                               java.lang.String[] groups,
                               int settings)
        Adding a new group to the database and also adding the selected members and member groups
        Parameters:
        groupname - - group's name
        userID - - creator's ID
        members - - array of members to be added to new group
        groups - - array of groups to be added to the new group
        settings - - privacy settings of the new group
        Returns:
        last update: 11/07/17 by L. Barraquias - updated query code for hoamis DB | Change username to userID
